messages.msgSnippet: ... == You re welcome. Glad the results turned out so well for it :-) Todd If you choose not to decide, you still have made a choice. I will choose Free Will
messages.messageBody:
At 05:52 AM 9/28/02 -0700, you wrote:

>Now the results are 1123 NO (89%) and only 140 YES (11%)
>Thank you Todd for bringing it to my attention!
>Jennifer S.
==
You're welcome. Glad the results turned out so well for it :-)

Todd

"If you choose not to decide, you still have made a choice.
I will choose Free Will" -Rush (& Todd)
http://rambleman.tripod.com/index.html

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Survey. Please vote :)
messages.msgSnippet: Now the results are 1123 NO (89%) and only 140 YES (11%) Thank you Todd for bringing it to my attention! Jennifer S. MO Milligans wrote: On the NBC 7/39
messages.messageBody:
Now the results are 1123 NO (89%) and only 140 YES (11%)
Thank you Todd for bringing it to my attention!
Jennifer S.
MO Milligans wrote:> On the NBC 7/39 website they have a survey asking
> "Should home school instructors need a teaching credential?"
> When I looked, the results were about 68%-NO, ?-YES. I believe this is
from an
> uninformed voting group. We need to show our opinion. I believe that
> they will broadcast the results on the evening news.
>
> <http://www.nbcsandiego.com/>http://www.nbcsandiego.com/
>
> The survey is on the lower right side of the page.
==
Todd

"If you choose not to decide, you still have made a choice.
I will choose Free Will" -Rush (& Todd)
http://rambleman.tripod.com/index.html





Have a beautiful day!

Mrs. Schroeck

http://homeschool.schroeckfamily.com
